sqlMap.select: select CREDIT_HISTORY_ID, LOAN_ORGANIZATION, CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID, LOAN_DATE, TERM_DATE, CREDIT_ACCOUNT, USED_ACCOUNT, ACCOUNT_STATUS, REPAYMENT_TYPE, LOAN_AMOUNT, REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_PER from RL_CREDIT_HISTORY where CREDIT_HISTORY_ID = #creditHistoryId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_BASIC_INFO.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into RL_CREDIT_HISTORY (CREDIT_HISTORY_ID, LOAN_ORGANIZATION, CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID, LOAN_DATE, TERM_DATE, CREDIT_ACCOUNT, USED_ACCOUNT, ACCOUNT_STATUS, REPAYMENT_TYPE, LOAN_AMOUNT, REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_PER) values (#creditHistoryId:DECIMAL#, #loanOrganization:VARCHAR#, #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#, #loanDate:TIMESTAMP#, #termDate:TIMESTAMP#, #creditAccount:DECIMAL#, #usedAccount:DECIMAL#, #accountStatus:CHAR#, #repaymentType:CHAR#, #loanAmount:DECIMAL#, #repaymentAmountPer:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_CREDIT_HISTORY set LOAN_ORGANIZATION = #loanOrganization:VARCHAR#, CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID = #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#, LOAN_DATE = #loanDate:TIMESTAMP#, TERM_DATE = #termDate:TIMESTAMP#, CREDIT_ACCOUNT = #creditAccount:DECIMAL#, USED_ACCOUNT = #usedAccount:DECIMAL#, ACCOUNT_STATUS = #accountStatus:CHAR#, REPAYMENT_TYPE = #repaymentType:CHAR#, LOAN_AMOUNT = #loanAmount:DECIMAL#, REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_PER = #repaymentAmountPer:DECIMAL# where CREDIT_HISTORY_ID = #creditHistoryId:DECIMAL#

update RL_CREDIT_HISTORY
LOAN_ORGANIZATION = #loanOrganization:VARCHAR#
CREDIT_INVESTIGATIO_ID = #creditInvestigatioId:DECIMAL#
LOAN_DATE = #loanDate:TIMESTAMP#
TERM_DATE = #termDate:TIMESTAMP#
CREDIT_ACCOUNT = #creditAccount:DECIMAL#
USED_ACCOUNT = #usedAccount:DECIMAL#
ACCOUNT_STATUS = #accountStatus:CHAR#
REPAYMENT_TYPE = #repaymentType:CHAR#
LOAN_AMOUNT = #loanAmount:DECIMAL#
REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_PER = #repaymentAmountPer:DECIMAL#
where CREDIT_HISTORY_ID = #creditHistoryId:DECIMAL#
